topic.title: Updating the Oxygen Content Fusion Connector Add-on

keywords.indexterm: Updating Oxygen Content Fusion Connector add-on

body.p: The Oxygen Content Fusion Connector add-on is updated periodically to enhance its functionality and solve issues. There are several ways to update the add-on and there is an option that you can select to have Oxygen XML Editor/Author automatically check for add-on updates at startup.

section.title: How to Enable Automatic Add-on Update Checking
section.p: To instruct Oxygen XML Editor/Author to automatically check for add-on updates when the application is started, go to Options / Preferences / Add-ons and select the Enable automatic updates checking option.

section.title: How to Update the Content Fusion Add-on
section.p: There are several ways to updates the Oxygen Content Fusion Connector add-on:

dlentry.dd:
If you have enabled the automatic add-on update checking feature, whenever the add-on is updated, you will receive a notification the next time you start Oxygen XML Editor/Author that an update is available. To update the add-on, follow these steps:
Click Review updates in the pop-up notification.
Make sure the Oxygen Content Fusion Connector add-on is selected in the next dialog box and click Update.
Select the I accept all terms of the end user license agreement option and click Finish.
Restart the application.

To manually check for updates, go to Help / Check for add-ons updates. If there is an update available for the add-on, this dialog box will display Update available in the Status column. To update the add-on, follow these steps:
Make sure the Oxygen Content Fusion Connector add-on is selected and click Update.
Select the I accept all terms of the end user license agreement option and click Finish.
Restart the application.

You can also go to Help / Manage add-ons to check for updates. If there is an update available for the add-on, this dialog box will display Update available in the Status column. To update the add-on, follow these steps:
Make sure the Oxygen Content Fusion Connector add-on is selected and click Update.
Select the I accept all terms of the end user license agreement option and click Finish.
Restart the application.
